S.FORM: India Gaga kska Yacow ka India, 20 00 N, 77 00 E ka gaga na nniqan. Kana ka knlbangan na o 3,287,263 sq km(hangan na o Tg7)(knlbanga dxgal o 2,973,193 sq km, knlbangan qsiya o 314,070 sq km). Kana ka sejiqun o niqan 1,266,883,598 hiyi. Gaga New Delhi ka pusu alang paru, jiyax 26 idas 1 ka jiyax skrayan klwaan. Manu ka dxgal India ga wada sugan 60.50 ka dxgal qpahan, 23.10 ka dxgal bbuyu, rahuq dxgal do niqan 16.40 na. Bukung klwaan ta sayang o kiya ka Pranab Mukherjee, pnaah hngkawas2012 idas 7 jiyax 25pnrajing kmlawa klwaan.
